channel.title: Help with my laggy unstable server
channel.description: Hi, this is the first private server i've ever created but it sucks. My computer is 6 years old, i'm using dial-up, and i don't have a router. When people connect to my server, they get easily disconnected and lagg alot. Also there alot of very small glitches that make my server look like crap(like when you folow somone...they walk past a wall, and you go through it.). What can i do? I've heard of a vps, but will that help? I just want a stable server that i can leave on hours at a time without worrying about it crashing.

item.title: Help with my laggy unstable server
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

in client.java search for process() and delete useless shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my laggy unstable server
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

Ok well when your computer is 6 years old that is going to be a reason why its so slow, another reason is that your on dial up, and your question about the vps: 1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked. Requesting a hoster, coder, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related.

Read full topic
